name: Salomon X10 Ergo S3 Ski Poles - Unisex
description: Match these poles to your performance setup. Their grip features an adjustable safety spring, for quick one-handed releases when you need it. With high quality construction from grip to tip, it's a premium pole for confident skiers who charge through turns without hesitation.18mm aluminum shaft is light and strong, with great performance.Ergo S3 adjustable safety spring gives you one-handed quick release.Premium strap has a wide range of adjustment for lots of glove and hand sizes.Interchangeable all mountain basket allows snag-free turns.Carbide/widia tip punches through ice and hardpack.
